thread.title: Moto celebrates 3rd anniversary in India with discounts and exchange offers
thread.title_full: Moto celebrates 3rd anniversary in India with discounts and exchange offers

title: Moto celebrates 3rd anniversary in India with discounts and exchange offers
text:
Moto celebrates 3rd anniversary in India with discounts and exchange offers Moto celebrates 3rd anniversary in India with discounts and exchange offers By - February 17, 2017 “The entire Moto series phones including E, M, G and Z are available with discounts and offers” 
Lenovo is celebrating the Moto’s third year anniversary in India with discounts and exchange offers on several smartphones. The brand will be hosting its Moto Days sale on its online sales partner Flipkart. The company’s entire range of Moto smartphones from the Moto E, Moto M, Moto G and Moto Z are available with discounts and exchange offers. 
Here’s the list: Moto Z – additional Rs 2,000 off on regular exchange value (up to Rs 20,000) Moto Z Play – additional Rs 2,000 off on regular exchange value (up to Rs 20,000) Moto M – additional Rs 1,000 off on regular exchange value (up to Rs 15,000) Moto E Power – available at Rs 7,499 (Rs 500 discount) Moto G Turbo Edition – available at Rs 8,999 (Rs 1,000 discount) Nexus 6 32GB – available at Rs 19,999 (Rs 4,000 discount) Nexus 6 64GB – available at Rs 25,999 (Rs 4,000 discount) Moto G 3 rd -gen – available at Rs 7,999 (Rs 2,000 discount)
